## Vector (aka mother of all data structures)

```{r basics}
# Skalar?
x <- 5

# First element
x[1]

# Everything is an object
class(x)

nm <- c("Peter", "Bender")
nr <- c(2, 4)

paste("Hi", nm, "your id is", nr)
```

-----

## data frame (aka workhorse)

```{r basics-df}
head(mtcars)

# df[rows, columns]
mtcars[mtcars$gear == 4, c("cyl", "gear")]
```

-----

## apply family or how to loop

```{r basics-loops}
# extraordinary
l <- list()
for(i in 1:4){
  l[[i]] <- sqrt(i)
}
l

# apply family
l <- lapply(1:4, sqrt)
l
```
